body: Holy shit. Well, I'm one for dark takes on series, but holy shit. This is not a hentai doujin. This is just a dark version of Girls Und Panzer, and by god is it tragic. Makes me think of Madoka Magica. Honestly I have no idea what to say.

damn I'm not horny at all. this is not a hentai doujinshi, this is just an R rate comic.
but i like it, i like the R rate genre

God damn it. Why does this abomination even exist? This show is wholesome and sweet, and this shit exists. Well this is the Internet so shit like this will happen no matter how sweet and wholesome the original media is. If only the person behind this would stop updating the dialogue in this so we can stop having this shit plague or community. But that will never happen so long as the worst parts of the community remain alive. This entire three piece doujin series is just the worst thing to come out of this series. Let it be known that this shit will not stand, the true community of this wholesome series will not submit to this level of degeneracy, we stand tall and proud for our beloved show that does not need this kind of crap in it. Wholesome and sweet, that is Girls und Panzer, that is what is is and that is what this show will always be. Yes I'm triggered. I hate this and how it just kills of so many of our beloved girls so I'm going to leave this comment here and leave this wreche
At least the best girls didn’t die “Darjeeling and Kay”
Lmao battle of the bulge reference

Let the word go forth from this time and place, to coomer and cringer alike, that the torch has been passed to a new generation of perverts-—born in these 6 digits, tempered by snuff, disciplined by a hard and bitter fap, proud of our wretched tastes—and unwilling to witness or permit the slow undoing of those cursed doujins to which this site has always been committed, and to which we are committed today at nhentai and around the web.
Wanted some yuri, got like 2 pages of it, now going through a rabbit hole of Girls Und Panzer lore
Tfw you forget to check the tags...
In case anyone's curious why this TK classic is reappearing in their feed, the gallery was updated with a translated post script.
